ComicInfo.Summary:
*Contents* Gail-Ford--Girl Friday "Girl Snatchers," Crime Smashers #8, January 1952
Ray Hale, News Ace "After-Hours Killing," Super-Detective, February 1950
Polly of the Plains "Trapped," Spicy Western, November 1937 "Doomed," Spicy Western, December 1937 *
Sally The Sleuth "The Hidden Corpse Part II," Spicy Detective, March 1938
Diana Daw Spicy Adventure, February 1937, April 1937 & May 1937
* (A very prophetic title since, despite the next issue blurb, Polly of the Plains was cancelled with this episode.)
